description: This is a generic table that contains every Problem List (LPL) record regardless of its type. It also contains a link to the patient record that is associated with the LPL record, a column indicating the type of LPL record, and an optional link from a Problem History record (type 7) to the corresponding Problem record (type 1) that it describes.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record associated with this problem list.

columns.name: HX_SOURCE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the problem record that this history record describes.

columns.name: RECORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the type of information stored in this record, such as Problem List, Allergy, Immunization, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: No
